So I was playing around spotify today and found the other way of doing what Mohnish specified in his blog about repeating a track in spotify. For this trick you don’t have to create a whole new playlist and add one track to it. Your regular playlist will do.

1) search for the track that you want to repeat in your playlist.

2) Make sure only one song( that you want to repeat) is returned from your search.

3) play that song and select repeat.

Voila!! That track will be in repeat mode until you clear that text in the search box. ;)
